title: Enhancing Patient Care Competencies: Interactive Question Design Strategies in MOOC Lecture Videos

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and design three types of interactive questions in MOOC videos: attention-stimulating behavioral prompts, cognitive load-reducing prompts, and situation-based thinking prompts.
Learners can develop science domain-appropriate question-insertion strategies to improve learner engagement by 20% or more.
Learners can analyze question data in blended environments for formative assessment use.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
